What is FNAF 3?

Set thirty years after the original events, FNAF 3 places players as a night guard in a horror attraction that uses old props and legends from the pizzeria‚Äôs dark past. As the nights progress, the single animatronic, Springtrap, stalks you relentlessly. Meanwhile, phantom animatronics like Phantom Freddy, Chica, and Foxy create terrifying distractions that leave you vulnerable.

How to Play FNAF 3?

  • Monitor Cameras: Track Springtrap‚Äôs movements through security feeds.
  • Use Audio Lures: Play sounds to lure Springtrap away from your office.
  • Seal Vents: Close off pathways to stop Springtrap from sneaking in.
  • Reboot Systems: Use the maintenance panel to reset cameras, audio, or ventilation when they fail.
  • Survive the Night: Last from midnight to 6 a.m. against the threats.

Why Play FNAF 3 Unblocked?

FNAF 3 Unblocked lets you face Springtrap anywhere‚Äîschool, work, or home. With its unique single-enemy setup and intense atmosphere, it offers a different kind of fear compared to earlier games in the series.

  • Phantom Animatronics: Hallucinations that disrupt your focus and systems.
  • System Management: Keep cameras, ventilation, and audio online to survive.
